description: Descubre los mejores hoteles en Budapest, Hungary. Encuentra ofertas exclusivas y alojamientos de lujo.

hotels.title: Refined Budapest Heritage Stay with Daily Breakfast, Daily Spa Access & Dining Credit
hotels.description: History and hedonism sit side by side at this contemporary urban retreat, a member of the acclaimed Small Luxury Hotels of the World. Located in a renowned heritage building, this five-star property is designed by legendary architect Ray Rezső, combining modern luxury with antique elegance. Positioned just two blocks from the city's Grand Boulevard, Kozmo Hotel Suites & Spa is perfectly located for exploring the best of Budapest. Stroll along the famous Danube River, wander up and down the hills of Buda or meander through the flat streets of Pest to absorb the rich culture and diverse landscapes this city has to offer. When it's time to treat yourself, get pampered with a massage or beauty treatment in the majestic Spa by Valmont, and stop by the elegant Bistro, known for its refined offering of local and international dishes in a sophisticated setting.

hotels.title: Contemporary Boutique Escape in Budapest's Castle District with Rooftop Bar & Sauna
hotels.description: Perched dramatically at the entrance of the Széchenyi Chain Bridge, this boutique hotel is an architectural marvel with a distinctive facade that captures the essence of Budapest's urban landscape. Fuel up with a delicious brunch of eggs royale and grilled sausages at the LEO Bistro, or skip straight to the rooftop for cocktails paired with jaw-dropping cityscapes. Unwind at the fitness centre with its Finnish dry sauna or visit one of the art exhibitions held in the Art Corner. Hotel Clark Budapest sits right in the Castle District, meaning you're steps from the remarkable Széchenyi Chain Bridge and a short walk from Buda Castle and Fisherman's Bastion for scenic city views. If you want to check out buzzing bars, cafes and shops, cross the bridge to the Pest side in no time at all. Plus, with trams and metros close by, exploring the city is a breeze.

hotels.title: Five-Star Budapest Glamour on the Danube Promenade with Buda Castle Views
hotels.description: Blessed with one of the city’s best addresses - on the Danube Promenade just steps from a vibrant dining and bar scene and the somber Shoes on the Danube sculpture - the five-star InterContinental Budapest, an IHG Hotel, was made for riverside relaxation in the heart of the city. Enjoy authentic Lebanese cuisine at ARZ Lebanese Restaurant, cocktails overlooking Buda Castle at Corso Bar and Terrace, a fully equipped fitness area, serene spa, and the exclusive Club InterContinental.

hotels.title: Five-Star City Break in the Heart of Budapest with Rooftop Bar & Onsite Spa
hotels.description: Enter a world of intrigue at the imaginative and uniquely styled Mystery Hotel Budapest, a five-star boutique hotel in the heart of Hungary's capital. Housed in a 19th-century palace, this eclectic hotel is a striking landmark in the city's sixth district. On the fourth floor of the hotel, you'll find The Great Hall Restaurant & Lounge, as opulent as a palace ballroom and the perfect spot to sit and admire the centrepiece chandelier over a glass of wine or slice of cake. For incredible city views and a tasty array of bar snacks and drinks (think burgers and marinated olives, plus a wide range of spirits and gin and tonic cocktails), make your way to The Sky Garden. Within a Baroque-style garden, you'll find The Secret Garden Day Spa, where whirlpool spas, a Finnish sauna and a range of body treatments offer absolute relaxation.

hotels.title: Sophisticated Five-Star Budapest Heritage Stay with Daily Breakfast
hotels.description: History and hedonism sit side by side at the contemporary Kozmo Hotel Budapest, Hungary's only Leading Hotels of the World member. Occupying an emblematic heritage building two blocks from the city’s Grand Boulevard, this chic outpost is perfectly positioned for days spent wandering up and down the hills of Buda, the flat streets of Pest and alongside the iconic Danube River. Kozmo Hotel Budapest offers a masterclass in distinctive design, effortlessly combining heritage features with a modern minimalist aesthetic across its lobby, rooms and suites. Slink to the sleek wellness centre for relaxed laps in the indoor heated pool or take it up a notch at the fitness centre. Bring it all back down again with a massage or beauty treatment, or reward yourself with a meal at the restaurant, known for its refined offering of local and international dishes. An open kitchen gives you a front-row seat to the culinary magic, best accompanied by a wine from the extensive list of Old and New World producers. **Luxury Escapes inclusions:** - Graze your way through a **daily breakfast buffet** of continental classics and à la carte hot dishes - Start your stay with a seasonal **drink on arrival** - Relax and recharge with a **one-hour spa pass** (for stays of 3+ nights) **Travelling with family?** Choose a Family Room for up to four guests, comprised of two connecting but independent Standard Rooms to ensure privacy and peace.
